Uses of Class
com.bmwcarit.barefoot.matcher.Server.OutputFormatter

  • Packages that use Server.OutputFormatter 
    Package Description
    com.bmwcarit.barefoot.matcher
    Hidden Markov Model (HMM) map matching to determine an object's path (online or offline) and an object's current position (online) on the map.

    • Uses of Server.OutputFormatter in com.bmwcarit.barefoot.matcher

      Subclasses of Server.OutputFormatter in com.bmwcarit.barefoot.matcher 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Server.DebugJSONOutputFormatter
      Output formatter for writing extensive format of input and output of map matching in a JSON response message.
      static class  Server.GeoJSONOutputFormatter
      Output formatter for writing the geometries of a map matched paths into GeoJSON response message.
      static class  Server.SlimJSONOutputFormatter
      Output formatter for writing map matched positions, represented be road id and fraction, and the geometry of the routes into a JSON response message.
      Methods in com.bmwcarit.barefoot.matcher with parameters of type Server.OutputFormatter 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void ServerControl.initServer(String serverFile, String databaseFile, Server.InputFormatter input, Server.OutputFormatter output)
      Initializes stand-alone map matching server.
      Constructors in com.bmwcarit.barefoot.matcher with parameters of type Server.OutputFormatter 
      Constructor and Description
      Server(int portNumber, int maxRequestTime, int maxResponseTime, int maxConnectionCount, int numIOThreads, int matcherMinInterval, RoadMap map, Matcher matcher, Server.InputFormatter input, Server.OutputFormatter output)
      Creates a Server object as stand-alone offline map matching server.
